Target content: The contribution of the sectors covered by the EU ETS with respect to the EU Climate ambition should be of -62 % compared to 2005 (increasing the linear emissions reduction factor from 2.2 % per year up to 4.4 %)
NACE Level 1: D - Electricity, Gas, Steam and Air Conditioning Supply
NACE Level 2: D35 - Electricity, gas, steam and air conditioning supply
NACE Level 3: D35.1 - Electric power generation, transmission and distribution
Justification: The target involves reducing emissions, which are significant in the energy and manufacturing sectors covered by the EU ETS.

Target content: Achieve an EU net greenhouse gas removal of 310 million tonnes CO2 equivalent per year for the land use, land use change and forestry (LULUCF) sector
NACE Level 3: A2.1 - Silviculture and other forestry activities
Justification: This target is related to land use, forestry, and agriculture sectors for carbon sequestration.

Target content: Energy demand to be covered by solar heat and geothermal should at least triple (currently rate at 1.5%)
NACE Level 1: D - Electricity, Gas, Steam and Air Conditioning Supply
NACE Level 2: D35 - Electricity, gas, steam and air conditioning supply
NACE Level 3: D35.1 - Electric power generation, transmission and distribution
Justification: The target focuses on renewable energy, relevant to the electricity supply sector.

Target content: Indicative national targets aiming to achieve the deep renovation of at least 35 million building units by 2030 to support reaching an annual energy renovation rate of 3 % or more for the period till 2050
NACE Level 3: F41.2 - Construction of residential and non-residential buildings
Justification: The target pertains to building renovation, directly involving the construction sector.

Target content: By 2030 textile products placed on the EU market are long-lived and recyclable, to a great extent made of recycled fibres, free of hazardous substances and produced in respect of social rights and the environment
Justification: This target is focused on the manufacturing of textiles, emphasizing sustainability and recycling.

NACE Level 2: C16 - Manufacture of wood and of products of wood and cork, except furniture
NACE Level 3: C16.2 - Manufacture of products of wood, cork, straw and plaiting materials
Justification: The target is about recycling wood products, relevant to wood product manufacturing.

Target content: From 1 January 2020, this Regulation sets an EU fleet-wide target of 95 g CO2/km for the average emissions of new passenger cars and an EU fleet-wide target of 147 g CO2/km for the average emissions of new light commercial vehicles registered in the Union
NACE Level 2: C29 - Manufacture of motor vehicles, trailers and semi-trailers
NACE Level 2 extra1: H49 - Land transport and transport via pipelines
Justification: The target focuses on emissions from vehicles, relevant to vehicle manufacturing and transport sectors.

Target content: by 31 December 2030, in each safe and secure parking area at least four publicly accessible recharging stations dedicated to heavy-duty electric vehicles with an individual power output of at least 100 kW are deployed
NACE Level 2: H52 - Warehousing and support activities for transportation
Justification: The target is about infrastructure for electric vehicles, linked to the transportation and warehousing sector.

Target content: Strengthen educational messages on the importance of healthy nutrition, sustainable food production and consumption, and reducing food waste.
NACE Level 1 extra1: I - Accommodation and Food Service Activities
NACE Level 2 extra1: I56 - Food and beverage service activities
Justification: The target is educational but related to food services, focusing on sustainable food practices.

Target content: Strengthen the resilience of the EU food system. Build up resilience to possible future diseases and pandemics. Increasing the sustainability of food producers will ultimately increase their resilience.
NACE Level 2: A1 - Crop and animal production, hunting and related service activities
Justification: The target is focused on agriculture and food production resilience, relevant to the agriculture sector.
No content was provided for this target.

Target content: Develop measures to significantly increase efforts to identify, investigate, assess and remediate contaminated sites, so that soil pollution will no longer pose a health or environmental risk (target in common with the Biodiversity Strategy)
NACE Level 1 extra1: Sewerage, Waste Management and Remediation Activities
NACE Level 2 extra1: E39 - Remediation activities and other waste management services
NACE Level 3 extra1: E39.0 - Remediation activities and other waste management services
column13: The target addresses soil remediation, relevant to waste management and remediation services.
